name: coffee-export-consortium-blockchain
description: Consortium blockchain for managing coffee exports using Hyperledger Fabric

scripts.install:all: npm run install:exporter-bank && npm run install:national-bank && npm run install:ncat && npm run install:shipping-line
scripts.build:all: npm run build:exporter-bank && npm run build:national-bank && npm run build:ncat && npm run build:shipping-line
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run network:up && npm run channel:create && npm run chaincode:deploy
scripts.clean: npm run network:down && rm -rf api/*/node_modules api/*/dist api/*/wallet
